channel.title: Refactored 317
channel.description:
If you have any corrections or something new I haven't refactored yet please post here.
The current Github commit is broken so if you're interested in using this use the archived working version from MediaFire below.
[s][B]Github:[/B] [url=https://github.com/Rabrg/refactored-client/tree/master/]https://github.com/Rabrg/refactored-client/tree/master/[/url][/s] [B]Download:[/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/8vz4d9a585489rf/refactored_317.rar]refactored_317.rar[/url]
[B]Completely refactored:[/B]
[ul][li]GameShell[/li] [li]GameFrame[/li] [li]Archive[/li] [li]Index[/li] [li]IdentityKit[/li] [li]ActorDefinition[/li] [li]ItemDefinition[/li] [li]OnDemandNode[/li] [li]OnDemandRequester[/li] [li]Requester[/li] [li]ImageRGB[/li] [li]IndexedImage[/li] [li]ModelHeader[/li] [li]ProducingGraphicsBuffer[/li] [li]Rasterizer[/li] [li]Skins[/li] [li]TypeFace[/li] [li]VertexNormal[/li] [li]Widget[/li] [li]Buffer[/li] [li]BufferedConnection[/li] [li]ISAACCipher[/li] [li]Cache[/li] [li]CachableNode[/li] [li]HashTable[/li] [li]LinkedList[/li] [li]Node[/li] [li]Queue[/li] [li]Renderable[/li] [li]Projectile[/li] [li]CollisionMap[/li] [li]SoundFilter[/li] [li]SoundTrack[/li] [li]SoundTrackEnvelope[/li] [li]SoundTrackInstrument[/li] [li]ChatEncoder[/li] [li]MouseCapturer[/li] [li]TextUtils[/li] [li]SignLink[/li][/ul]
[B]Credits:[/B]
[ul][li]super_ - The sound system, OnDemandRequester, CollisionMap[/li] [li]`Discardedx2 - The original deob[/li] [li]Maxi - Map related classes[/li] [li]Peterbjornx - Model related classes[/li][/ul]

item.dc:creator: @Cyberus Cyberus
item.description:
@Cyberus wrote:

I’ve updated the thread with a working version of the client.

School is over for me now so I’ll probably be continuing this.

item.dc:creator: @aaa805 aaa805
item.description:
@aaa805 wrote:

Cyberus:

feel free to contribute

I suggest you take a look at mine and peterbjornx’s work here.
http://code.google.com/p/rename317

Please bear in mind that our naming on the sound synth is complelty guesswork and not to be taken as true code values.

item.title: Refactored 317
item.dc:creator: @S_v2 .S. v2
item.description:
@S_v2 wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:8, topic:481769”]‘GameShell’
‘GameFrame’

What. The rest is…acceptableish.[/quote]

The original name for that class is GameShell.

Read full topic

item.title: Refactored 317
item.dc:creator: @Yesteryear Yesteryear
item.description:
@Yesteryear wrote:

sinisoul:

Array list? What the hell are you smoking…it’s a hash table.

Shit, nevermind. I thought the table got the values from the array with its index number (which is actually right), but didn’t realise that that number was the hash.

Read full topic

item.title: Refactored 317
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Array list? What the hell are you smoking…it’s a hash table.

Read full topic

item.title: Refactored 317
item.dc:creator: @Yesteryear Yesteryear
item.description:
@Yesteryear wrote:

[quote=“Cyberus, post:4, topic:481769”][quote author=Yesteryear link=topic=600007.msg4215744#msg4215744 date=1360267344]
Wow nice. Pretty cool. But it’s not your work as you already said
[/quote]
I’ve done everything that people didn’t get credited for in the credits[/quote]
Ooh, nevermind then. I didn’t realise that.

Edit:
“HashTable” has definetly no hash, nor table structure. It’s more some sort of array list that doesn’t expand.

Read full topic

item.title: Refactored 317
item.dc:creator: @Cyberus Cyberus
item.description:
@Cyberus wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:8, topic:481769”]‘GameShell’
‘GameFrame’

What. The rest is…acceptableish.[/quote]
Game and Frame are for pretty obvious reasons and shell means that its extended/added on to. If anything isn’t acceptable then feel free to contribute.

Read full topic

item.title: Refactored 317
item.dc:creator: @Cyberus Cyberus
item.description:
@Cyberus wrote:

latifundio:

Just wondering how much time this took you? and if your using the 377 cache with it?

Haven’t really been keeping track; I’ve been working on it on and off over a couple weeks. It’s not loading the 377 cache atm but all you gotta do is search up “0x7a120” in Client and replace it with “0xffffff” (without the quotes)

Read full topic

item.description:
@Cyberus wrote:

If you have any corrections or something new I haven’t refactored yet please post here.

The current Github commit is broken so if you’re interested in using this use the archived working version from MediaFire below.

Github: https://github.com/Rabrg/refactored-client/tree/master/
Download: refactored_317.rar
